title: Every Breath You Take
description: She's a sassy single mom... He's a hardened homicide detective. —Shelby—I'm a single mom with a past darker than coal.I've endured a life of pain, escaped a monster, and survived hell.Because of my past, the walls surrounding my heart are strong.Impenetrable.But those walls begin to crumble the moment I meet him...Detective Anthony Moretti.He's everything I've ever wanted, and everything my son deserves.As irresponsible and dangerous as it may be, I want him.But we don't always get what we want, do we?With the monster from my past closing in, I push Anthony away.But he isn't having it.Hell-bent on staking his claim, he won't give up.No matter how hard I push, he doesn't budge.As far as he's concerned, my fate is sealed.But the monster from my past still lurks. And whether or not I'm ready, it's about to rear its ugly head.Warning: Contains triggers.The Redeeming Love Series:Book One: Every Moment with You (Hendrix and Maddie)Book Two: Every Breath You Take (Anthony and Shelby) Book Three: Every Promise You Made (Evan and Hope) Book Four: Every Tear You Cry (Brantley and Clara) Book Five: Every Time We Touch (Kyle and Carissa)Book Six: Every Wrong You Right (Ty and Heidi) Each book in the Redeeming Love Series can be read as a standalone.
author: J.E.  Parker
